q: Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said. ''I think he'd clear the field.'' Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Under this bizarre legal theory, virtually every FCC decision would wind up in one court. Verizon has made a blatant attempt to locate its challenge in a favorable appeals court forum. The company's theory assumes that all agency actions changing rules are ''modifications'' to hundreds of thousands of licenses. This would insure the case remains in the District of Columbia Circuit, and keeps others from seeking review in different courts. said Andrew Jay Schwartzman, senior vice president and policy director of Media Access Project, in statement.
